body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky farmer. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth A. Smith. Father of Joseph M. Smith, John W. Smith, Dudley R. Smith, Reuben C. Smith, and Thomas M. Smith, Jr. Held five slaves in 1860.
